experiences.description: Focused on developing business process solutions using Scriptcase (PHP) and SQL Server. Also, in the development and deployment of mobile applications with Kalipso Studio, published in Google Play Store and distributed privately through Apple Store.

Develop an API for an electronic invoicing system using NestJS with TypeORM, PostgreSQL, and GitHub Actions. Follow a DevOps approach to implement CI/CD pipelines, leveraging tools like Insomnia for API testing. The project includes an in-depth analysis of Ecuador’s electronic invoicing process as defined by the SRI (Servicio de Rentas Internas).

Develop a real-time chat module using SocketIO for communication across multiple applications (driver, user, affiliate, and backend). I created backend services and interfaces for web and mobile platforms. I also built an advertising module for the administration platform, using technologies such as NestJS, PostgreSQL, React, Tailwind CSS, React Native, TypeORM and TypeScript.
